message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's see if you'll accept a slightly skewed deal

I'll try to get closer to a fair split, but I'm not giving up yet!

I'll make one last attempt to get a better deal, or I'll have to accept the consequences!
